main event: On 7 May 1949, a retired artist and his wife observed a strange object in the sky while sitting in their back yard in St. Louis, Missouri.
interesting points: The object appeared to be about the size of a light private airplane,The shape of the object resembled a Sting Ray fish without a tail,It was dark reddish brown in color but appeared buff colored to the observer,The object was seen to oscillate from side to side while flying in a straight path,The sighting lasted approximately 45 seconds and the object covered an angle of about 60 degrees in that time.
sighted object: a triangular object with oscillating motion
witness description: Mr. & Mrs. ________, retired artist in his late sixties and his wife, both considered reliable witnesses.
